type: ALTERATION OF LETTERHEAD AND BUSINESS CARD SUPPLIES
description: Recurring product order for Service Canada for label printign supplies Purchasing and Logistics
full_summary:
### Custom Labels Tender Announcement
#### Brief Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting suppliers to submit a Standing Offer for the supply of customized labels.

#### Tender Information

| **Document Reference** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS3941522205-Doc4531089900 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3941522205 |
| Tender Status | Cancelled |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2024-04-30 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2024-03-31 |

#### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** Government Departments (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Procurement Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Delivery Region:** Canada

#### Tender Description

This Standing Offer requires suppliers to provide customized labels for Service Canada's Passport program. The labels must meet specific technical requirements and standards.

#### Attachment Information

There are no attachments provided with this tender announcement.

#### Contact Information

* **Name:** Amal Wehbe (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** amal.wehbe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice and Attachment Links

[Notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19365962?extsite=MTkzNjU5NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note: I reorganized the content to make it easier to read and focused on the most relevant information. I also made significant changes to the text to improve grammar, clarity, and tone. Let me know if you want any adjustments!
